issue.title: [CF 333] multistate cooldowns
issue.body:
really should have their own icon type as well. Also, add a help popup when an ability is entered that is not on the user's action bars.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #333 | Raw
